title: game is not response and lose LP and promotion
body: Game is not response when i select hero，and  lost 20 LP and 1 time promotion that i did not  play，how to fix this problem？ seriously

replies.body: Sorry to hear that a response error caused you to get a promo loss.  :(  This can happen if you have a third party program running that interacts with league, or a unstable connection losing comms with champion select.  In this case, you should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, then test it in a custom game.  I hope that helps!
